name: Loan Open Tickets
query:
SELECT
  name AS Ticket_ID,
  employee_id AS Emp_ID,
  call_log_date AS Ticket_Raised_Date,
  employee_name AS Emp_Name,
  designation AS Emp_Designation,
  emp_department AS Emp_Department,
  branch_name AS Branch,
  region AS Region,
  phone1 AS Contact_No,
  ticket_type AS Ticket_Type,
  description AS Ticket_Description,
  tat AS TAT,
  total_days as Ticket_Age,
  status AS Ticket_Status,
  on_hold_remark AS On_Hold_Remark

FROM
  `tabSahayog Ticket`
WHERE
  dept_name = 'Loan' AND status NOT IN ('Closed', 'Cancelled');
